title: Which year or season was the best SNL cast of all times? - Quora

response.answer_text: I’ll give you five: 5. 1984-85 (Martin Short, Billy Crystal, Christopher Guest, Harry Shearer, Julia Louis-Dreyfus) 4. 2001–02 (Will Ferrell, Tracy Morgan, Tina Fey, Maya Rudolph, Amy Poehler, Seth Meyers) 3. 1990–91 (Dennis Miller, Jan Hooks, Dana Carvey, Phil Hartman, Mike Myers, Chris Rock, Julia Sweeney) 2. 1976–77 (Chevy Chase, John Belushi, Dan Aykroyd, Gilda Radner, Bill Murray, Laraine Newman 1. 2005–06 (Fey, Rudolph, Poehler, Meyers, Kenan Thompson, Andy Samberg, Kristen Wiig, Bill Hader, Jason Sudeikis)
